english: I usually wake up at 7 o'clock in the morning.
portuguese: Eu normalmente acordo às 7 horas da manhã.

english: We are going to the beach this weekend.
portuguese: Nós vamos à praia este fim de semana.

english: If I had more time, I would learn to play the guitar.
portuguese: Se eu tivesse mais tempo, eu aprenderia a tocar violão.

english: I have been studying English for three years.
portuguese: Eu estudo inglês há três anos.

english: She told me that she was feeling tired yesterday.
portuguese: Ela me disse que estava se sentindo cansada ontem.

english: Despite having studied hard, he didn't pass the exam.
portuguese: Apesar de ter estudado muito, ele não passou no exame.

english: By the time we arrive, they will have already left.
portuguese: Quando chegarmos, eles já terão partido.

english: Had I known about the traffic, I would have taken a different route.
portuguese: Se eu soubesse sobre o trânsito, eu teria pegado uma rota diferente.

english: Not only did she finish the project on time, but she also exceeded expectations.
portuguese: Ela não apenas terminou o projeto no prazo, mas também superou as expectativas.

english: Notwithstanding the numerous obstacles, the team managed to deliver exceptional results.
portuguese: Apesar dos inúmeros obstáculos, a equipe conseguiu entregar resultados excepcionais.

english: Can you say it again, please?
portuguese: Você pode dizer isso de novo, por favor?
grammar_points: Modal verb 'can' for requests, question formation with auxiliaries

english: Do you want to watch a movie?
portuguese: Você quer assistir a um filme?
grammar_points: Auxiliary 'do' for questions in present simple
Farewell expressions, difference between 'good night' and 'good evening'

english: I don't know how to use it.
portuguese: Eu não sei como usar isso.
grammar_points: How to + infinitive, negative present simple

english: I get off of work at 5.
I have to go to the supermarket.
portuguese: Eu tenho que ir ao supermercado.
Eu acho que é muito bom.

grammar_points: Present continuous for temporary states, 'sick' meanings
To be + adjective for physical states

english: I'm so pleased to meet you.
portuguese: Estou muito feliz em te conhecer.

english: I'm taking a shower and going to bed.
portuguese: Vou tomar banho e ir para a cama.
grammar_points: Present continuous for near future, 'taking a shower' expression

english: I'll call you when I leave.
portuguese: Vou te ligar quando eu sair.

grammar_points: To be + adjective for physical sensations
To be + adjective for physical needs

english: It's good to have you here!
It's good to see you again!
portuguese: É bom te ver de novo!
O que tem para o café da manhã hoje?

english: I didn't sleep very well, I had a bad dream.
portuguese: Eu não dormi muito bem, tive um pesadelo.
grammar_points: Past simple negative, irregular verbs (sleep, have)

english: I took an exam and did well.
portuguese: Eu fiz uma prova e fui bem.

english: Could you set the table, please?
portuguese: Você pode arrumar a mesa, por favor?
grammar_points: Modal 'could' for polite requests, expression 'set the table'

portuguese: Você quer um pouco de água?

english: Could you help me wash the dishes?
portuguese: Você pode me ajudar a lavar a louça?

english: Would you like to come over and play some videogame?
portuguese: Você gostaria de vir jogar videogame?
grammar_points: Would you like + infinitive, phrasal verb 'come over'

english: Can you switch the light on?
What would you like to do this evening?
portuguese: O que você gostaria de fazer esta noite?

english: Is there anything good on tv?
Are you up to anything this evening?
portuguese: Você vai fazer algo esta noite?

english: Do you want to order something to eat?
portuguese: Você quer pedir algo para comer?
Vamos comer fora hoje à noite!
grammar_points: Let's for suggestions, phrasal verb 'eat out'

english: What would you like for dinner?
portuguese: O que você gostaria para o jantar?

english: I have to wake up at 7.
grammar_points: Have to for obligation, phrasal verb 'wake up'
To be + adjective for physical states

english: Can you translate this for me?
portuguese: Você pode traduzir isso para mim?

english: I don't want to bother you.
If you need my help, please let me know.
portuguese: Se você precisar da minha ajuda, por favor me avise.

english: I'll take you to the bus stop.
portuguese: Vou te levar até o ponto de ônibus.

grammar_points: Present continuous for action in progress

english: I'm coming to pick you up.
grammar_points: Present continuous for near future, phrasal verb 'pick up'

english: I'm very busy. I don't have time now.
portuguese: Estou muito ocupado(a). Não tenho tempo agora.
Eu acho que tem um gosto bom.

english: I've been here for two days.
I've heard rio is a beautiful place.
portuguese: Ouvi dizer que o rio é um lugar bonito.

english: May I speak to mrs. Smith please?
portuguese: Posso falar com a sra. Smith, por favor?

english: Please take me to this address.
portuguese: Por favor, me leve a este endereço.
Você está livre hoje à noite?

grammar_points: Idiomatic expression for forgetting the past

english: To cost an arm and a leg.
